tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had gap issues in multiple teeth from childhood.  When i grew older like 16-17 , i always felt uncomfortable while smiling, specially in occasions. I started working on my own when i shifted from my hometown Allahabad to Delhi for college. I saved money which I get from my parents on monthly basis for hoping to get a new smile...i visited a dentist earlier but wasn't satisfied as they asked for large sum of money. Then I found Dr.. Pearl, as the name sounds beautiful as pearl, so is she. she gave me perfect smile today within my budget that was so satisfactory...Thanks to Dr, Pearl and her team❤️

I have been to 2-3 dentists in the past but wasn't satisfied with the experience. When I went to see Dr. Pearl, she explained everything well. I got a dental implant done. I'm satisfied with the treatment. The clinic is clean and well kept. They follow all Covid related protocols.

I got my tooth extraction and immediate implant done from Dr. Pearl in December. I got my final cap today. I'm quite happy with my experience. It was a pain free process. The doctor explained the procedure  quite well before starting any treatment. They also have a friendly payment policy. Overall I would recommend this clinic to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Tooth Coloured Fillings,Dental Crowns,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review: Soothing environment & friendly staff. Dr.Pearl is very patient in listening to all your problems , explains you the entire procedure & resolves all your issues. Got my tooth colour fillings done in no time. The RCT process was also painless. Will recommend everyone to at least visit her once.

I visited Dr. Pearl because I wanted to fix my yellow teeth. She was very patient and explained everything very well. She also told me that I had a few cavities in my teeth. I got my cavities treated and also underwent teeth whitening. I'm very happy with the results. My teeth have become visibly whiter and brighter. Thank you Dr. Pearl for my beautiful new smile.
reply_text: Thank you for your response. We hope to solve your dental problems in the future too.

review: Clean and modern clinic. Very professional doctor. I did not feel rushed and everything ws explained properly to me about the procedure. Very happy with the results.

review: The doctor was very friendly. Usually I am very scared to go to to a dentist however here I had a completely pain free experience. Even the ambience of the clinic is spectacular. I would recommend it to everyone.

review: It was a good experience with Dr. Pearl Bhardwaj. I was hesitant to visit a dentist due clean up myths, however she cleared all my doubts and questions. Overall it was great experience. Totally recommended!
